location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Henry Willock, His Majesty's Chargé d’Affaires at the Court of Persia

mods.abstract: In this letter Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, refers to Henry Willock's letter of 11 January 1824. He states that it appears that Captain Henry Hardy has not taken up any sums of money on account of the Mission, beyond the sum of 16,000 rupees mentioned in his (Hardy's) letter of 17 November 1823. Stannus suggests that it may be necessary to mention this circumstance to the Honourable Governor, Mountstuart Elphinstone.
